column3: c474e46ae7604f9b6cf8801207300b81c97e0499:\nMind adding the `.sh` extension to the `make_release_tarball` script name to make it available for `lint-shell.sh`?
e46e063562a433d8a3718036985e9008f6278bc0\nCould consider an alternative approach https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18349/commits/80190e7aeb7e730934271b03918640ec18a56dc5 that seems less hacky?

I'm going to close this. At this point we're not going to be backporting any tarball related changes to the 0.20 branch. I'll also echo the comments made in #18818; I haven't seen a single complaint/issue related to changes in the `0.20` tarball over the ~10 months since it's been released.
